getAllMessageForms

public java.lang.Iterable<Message.AlternateFormMapping> getAllMessageForms()
Description copied from interface: Message
Get the list of all possible messages. If there are not alternate message selectors, there will be a single entry with an empty list and the default value.

Specified by:
getAllMessageForms in interface Message
Specified by:
getAllMessageForms in interface MessageTranslation
Returns:
a list of all message forms, lexicographically sorted by the alternate forms for each message

Description copied from interface: Message

Specified by:
getTranslation in interface Message
Parameters:

Returns:
